      • getAll

        public static java.util.List<Island> getAll()
        Fetch a List of all Islands in the Database. This is then used in IslandCache#setup to put every island into a hashmap based on it's ID.
        Returns:
        List of Islands.

      • addIsland

        public static Island addIsland(java.util.UUID islandUUID,
                               java.util.UUID leaderUUID,
                               java.lang.String islandName,
                               org.spongepowered.api.world.Location<org.spongepowered.api.world.World> centerLoc)
        Adds the Island to the spongysb_islands database
        Parameters:
        islandUUID - The Islands' UUID
        leaderUUID - The Island Leaders UUID
        islandName - The name of the Island
        centerLoc - Center Location serialised as (x,z)
        Returns:
        Island Object

      • getIslandAt

        public static Island getIslandAt(int x,
                                 int z)
        Get an Island from it's coordinates This takes the two integers and does some mathsy stuff with them to get the nearest island center.
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate of the location
        z - Z coordinate of the location
        Returns:
        Island

      • getSize

        public double getSize()
        Gets the Size of the Island Border. Please note that this returns the SIZE fetched from the Config based on the island_size numerical order stored in the database.
        Returns:
        Size (actual)
